TempStable 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • my-vignette
  • Changelog

    Function to generate random variates of the TSS distribution.

    rTSS.Rd

    Generates n random numbers distributed according of the tempered stable subordinator distribution.

    rTSS(
  n,
  alpha = NULL,
  delta = NULL,
  lambda = NULL,
  theta = NULL,
  methodR = "AR",
  k = 10000
)

    Arguments

    n

    sample size (integer).

    alpha

    Stability parameter. A real number between 0 and 1.

    delta

    Scale parameter. A real number > 0.

    lambda

    Tempering parameter. A real number > 0.

    theta

    Parameters stacked as a vector.

    methodR

    A String. Either "AR" or "SR".

    k

    integer: the level of truncation, if methodR == "SR". 10000 by default.

    Value

    Generates n random numbers.

    Details

    theta denotes the parameter vector (alpha, delta, lambda). Either provide the parameters alpha, delta, lambda individually OR provide theta. "AR" stands for the Acceptance-Rejection Method and "SR" for a truncated infinite shot noise series representation. "AR" is the standard method used. For more details, see references.

    References

    Massing, Till (2022), 'Parametric Estimation of Tempered Stable Laws'

    Kawai, R & Masuda, H (2011), 'On simulation of tempered stable random variates' doi:10.1016/j.cam.2010.12.014

    Examples

    rTSS(100,0.5,1,1)
#>   [1] 2.0440881 1.4048513 1.5300772 1.3472235 5.2672478 3.2682069 3.3924474
#>   [8] 1.6611119 1.4985139 2.6260454 3.8171909 1.7508057 0.8014868 0.5263920
#>  [15] 1.1824585 3.0266135 0.9562988 4.1772325 1.0618441 0.6338435 1.0315593
#>  [22] 3.4085385 2.9798679 1.3859102 3.3001087 1.4818353 0.7590354 2.1672644
#>  [29] 3.5663824 0.8535206 1.5197280 2.9599402 1.8384767 1.7875643 2.1310538
#>  [36] 2.3192351 1.6742548 1.2179690 3.8759912 1.4086266 1.3144904 0.7815468
#>  [43] 2.6910916 1.1312862 0.7129231 1.7860778 1.0608409 1.4325348 2.2951458
#>  [50] 0.9118742 2.3368735 4.8651204 0.5409956 1.0312381 2.9568956 0.8195319
#>  [57] 1.0103045 2.1240292 1.3143002 0.6515854 1.1979026 0.7469572 0.6723574
#>  [64] 1.9456982 3.5852250 2.8475780 3.3600548 0.7735942 0.7246238 0.8518410

#>  [92] 0.8317497 1.2005457 0.9689984 3.7625235 1.6193277 0.5698879 2.0638746
#>  [99] 0.4958584 5.0309054
rTSS(100,0.5,1,1,NULL,"SR",50)
